wantStartMissionPhrase.content: Do you want to start a new mission?

wantResetProgressPhrase.content: Are you sure you want to discontinue the mission and lose all your progress?

wantExitPhrase.content: Do you want to quit the game?

returnToGamePhrase.content: You'll be returned to game process

repeatLastPhrase.content: I don't understand you. Please, repeat last command

exitPhrase.content: We had fun together. Let's do this again soon.

wantMissionFromBeginningPhrase.content: Do you want to start mission from the beginning?
